name: Circle Runner vs Red Ball FREE
name_original: Circle Runner vs Red Ball FREE
description:
Circle Runner vs Red Ball is amazing new action arcade game and it is almost impossible hard!

WARNING! Highly addicting!!!

Funny tiny red ball is trying to avoid falling down, try to keep your ball balance and stay top on the circle. This game is based on real geometry and 2d physics, this make it’s really fun and addictive game to play. Easy gameplay with easy controls gives you great gaming experience. Simple and colorful graphics makes game looking very clean and beautiful. This game is so hard and rush but it’s so fantastic game test your brain reflex and finger speed.
This game is working great on both phones and tablets.

You can control only your ball rolling speed and this make a circle rolling too. So you have to keep correct rolling speed or you start to drop down on the circle. Game may feel a little bit hard at first, but you stay longer on the circle when you are practicing more and become more familiar with a controls. You will get more and more points when you stay longer time on the circle.

This game is so simple, fun and addictive, so this makes you wonder that no one has done this kind of game a long time ago.

Did you need more than 2, 3 or 4 attempts to climb to the top of the hi-scores and also open achievements. Good luck!

[ CONTROL ]
- tap left side screen (roll left)
- tap right side screen (roll right)

[ BASIC RULES ]
- stay on the circle
- don't fall and keep your balance
- stay happy

[ WHAT YOU GET ]
- easy gameplay (tappy control)
- beautiful graphics
- fun and really addicting game
- this game makes you so happy
- amazing and same time almost impossible game
- practice your brain reflex and finger speed
- real 2d geometry and physics
- lot of crazy falls

Challenge your friends now and spend some amazing moments with your buddies, just play and enjoy! So now it's time to roll and stay on the circle!
